layout_header_title.help: Title of the app used in the main header

layout_logo_alt_text.help: Alt text for the logo in the main header

confirm_answerlist_header.help: Header for the list of answers

confirm_answerlist_cancel_edit_link_titl.help: Title text for the cancel button when editing an answer

confirm_answerlist_edit_link_title.help: Title text for the button used to start editing an answer

confirm_contact_invitation.help: Intro text for the contact section (inviting users to join HIH)

confirm_contact_email_label.help: Label for the email entry box in the contact section

confirm_contact_email_error.help: Error message that appears above the email entry box in the contact section if what you've entered isn't a valid email address (appears as you type)

confirm_contact_zip_label.help: Label for the ZIP code entry box in the contact section

confirm_contact_zip_error.help: Error message that appears above the ZIP code entry box in the contact section if already entered an email address but not a valid US ZIP code (appears as you type)

landing_message.help: Complete message for the landing page

prelaunch_login_password_label.help: The label for the password entry box

prelaunch_login_button_text.help: The text for the submit button

prelaunch_login_error.help: The error message that shows if you enter the wrong username/password in the prelaunch login screen

prelaunch_login_username_label.help: The label for the username entry box

cookie_notice_accept_button_text.help: Text for the button to accept cookies

cookie_notice_message.help: Main text for the notice popup

util_cancel_alt_text.help: Alt text for the little x icon used as a cancel button

util_edit_alt_text.help: Alt text for the little pencil icon used as an edit button

confirm_button_text.help: Text for the button you use to confirm answers and get results

confirm_restart_link_text.help: Text for the link to clear your answers and start the quiz over

quiz_save_failed_error.help: Message that appears if there's an error saving the answer

quiz_back_link_text.help: Text used for links that step backwards in the quiz sequence

util_restart_link_text.help: Text used for links that send the user back to the start of the quiz

quiz_cancel_link_text.help: Text used for links that take the user back to the landing page and clear any selected answers from memory

quiz_type_question.help: Question text for the Type question

quiz_type_short.help: Short name for the Type question, used for tooltips on the step counter

quiz_type_answer_a.help: Answer A (nanny) for the Type question

quiz_type_answer_b.help: Answer B (house cleaner) for the Type question

quiz_type_answer_c.help: Answer C (home attendant) for the Type question

quiz_type_answer_d.help: Answer D (home health care worker) for the Type question

quiz_type_help.help: Help text for the Type question

quiz_agency_answer_b.help: Answer B (no) for the Agency question
